availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: New Orleans, Louisiana, merchant. Louisiana native. Married to Anna Liveaudais on August 15, 1865. Merchant in New Orleans, Louisiana in 1860. Dry goods merchant with Giquel & Jamison in 1861 in New Orleans.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Louisiana, New Orleans, Fifth Ward, p. 919.
New Orleans, Louisiana, City Directory, 1861 (U.S., City Directories, 1822-1995 for T. Liveaudais), 281, https://www.ancestrylibrary.com/discoveryui-content/view/803002936:2469?tid=&pid=&queryId=e4186baf-9fab-4f5d-87a6-8b8bc418812f&phsrc=Egq219&phstart=successSource.
